form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: MANDATED REMOTE LEARNING FOR REMAINDER OF 2019 - 2020 SCHOOL YEAR

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-8 col-lg-8 backgroundcolor middle-content-panel

div.a: MANDATED REMOTE LEARNING FOR REMAINDER OF 2019 - 2020 SCHOOL YEAR

span.p: The Illinois Governor is extending the Remote Learning Plan for the remainder of the 2019 - 2020 school year. Please continue to check the website for continued information.
Select READ MORE>> for additional Information.
This was a collaborative effort between administration and members of the Granite City Federation of Teachers Union, Local 743.

img.alt: Build a Remote Learning Plan & Virtual Classroom in One Day

td.p:
Remote Learning Days begin on Tuesday 3-31-20.
Our plan is in place with our teachers Technological and Manuel lessons and methods,being provided for students and communicated with their families. We are working diligently to add additional strategies to this plan,
as it is our educational plan in place during the Governors period of school closings. We will continue to communicate with you on this topic.
Remote Learning Plan

Respectfully,
Mr. Jim Greenwald
Superintendent of Schools
GCSD9
